insert.sql: insert into ut_messages( UserID1, UserID2, Subject, Body, Date, Status, Support, GuildID) (select '$auth->user;',u.UserID,@Subject;,@Body;,@Date;,0,0,'$auth->guild;' from ut_users u left outer join gd_posts p using(UserID) where u.GuildID='$auth->guild;' and u.GuildStatusID=1 and u.UserID<>'$auth->user;' and (@TypeID;=0 or p.TypeID=@TypeID)) #insert into ut_messages( MessageID, UserID1, UserID2, Subject, Body, Date, Status, Support,GuildID) values('','$auth->user;',0,@Subject;,@Body;,@Date;,2,0,'$auth->guild;')

field.name: TypeID
field.sql: select 0,'Всем членам гильдии' union (select TypeID,Name from gd_post_types where GuildID='$auth->guild;' order by Name)

select.sql: select m.*, concat('',u.Login,'') as User, u.Login, u.UserID, if(m.Subject='' or m.Subject is null,'$message[234];',m.Subject ) as Subject from ut_messages m left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=m.UserID2 where m.GuildID='$auth->guild;' and Status=2 and Support<2 order by m.Date desc
select.action: delete from ut_messages where MessageID=@MessageID; and @delete;='on' and (Support<2) and GuildID='$auth->guild;'
select.header:
<input type='checkbox' onclick='markall(checked)' >
    


<script>

function markall(checked)
{

    for(i=0;i<document.forms['sent'].elements.length;i++)
    {
  	var item = document.forms['sent'].elements[i];
	if(item.type =='checkbox') item.checked = checked;
    }
}

</script>

message.select: select m.*,u.Login,FROM_UNIXTIME(m.Date,'%d.%m.%Y %H:%i') as Date, concat('',u.Login,'') as User from ut_messages m left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=m.UserID1 where MessageID='$id;' and (UserID2='$auth->user;' or UserID1='$auth->user;' or (Support>0 and '$support;'=1))
